mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, STATUS, QUIZ_ATTEMPT_COUNT, QUIZ_CORRECT_COUNT, CREATED_AT, UPDATE_AT ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{address}, NVL(#{status},'ACTIVE'), 0, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, STATUS, QUIZ_ATTEMPT_COUNT, QUIZ_CORRECT_COUNT, CREATED_AT, UPDATE_AT FROM MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
